programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes winning game day eats for herself and the kids. She starts with a beer cheese bread bowl and then makes hearty short rib stew served over buttered egg noodles. Her cookie salad is an unexpected treat.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: After Chris gets a special one-dollar bill for his birthday and quickly loses it, the dollar gets passed from character to character throughout Quahog.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: In a special anthology-style episode, Peter gets fired from his job at the brewery in the signature styles of three famous Hollywood film directors.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: When Brian posts an offensive tweet that goes viral and the rest of the Griffins are also treated as outcasts, he's forced to move out of the Griffin house.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving weekend, Peter discovers an alternate ending in the Russian version of one of his favorite films and writes to Vladimir Putin, who comes to Quahog. Meanwhile, a strapped-for-cash Brian gets a job at a suicide hotline center.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter encourages Meg to attend a high school party, where she takes up drinking, which both concerns and delights her father. Meanwhile, Brian begins spying on his neighbors and suspects Principal Shepherd of a crime.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A selfish Peter loses his Christmas spirit and is visited by ghosts of Christmas past, present and future who take him on a journey around Quahog in the style of Charles Dickens' 'A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: At the vet's office, Brian meets a female show dog named Ellie. Smitten with her, he enters a show dog competition, in which the winner gets to breed with her.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie and Brian get into a friendship-ending fight after Brian commits a terrible act to one of Stewie's beloved toys. Meanwhile, Peter refuses to wash his hand after meeting his favourite breakfast cereal mascot, Boo Berry.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie gets sent to see his school's child psychologist, Dr. Cecil Pritchfield, for a surprising session, which causes Stewie to reveal major, never-before-told secrets about himself.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: In a special Dickensian-themed episode, Stewie and Brian are detectives who embark on solving a string of mysterious murders set in Victorian-era London.

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: A young family builds their dream home in the Kentucky Hills, but their heaven is hell for the quiet couple living next door. Also, a dispute over a shared road leads to fireworks, fury, and cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Fear Thy Roommate
programme.desc: Two women strike up a fast friendship and move in together. But a lack of privacy and a secret relationship rips apart the harmony, and a battle for control ends in a brutal murder.

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: A lonely man in Florida has a whirlwind romance with a flight attendant, but her secrets will soon lead him down a path of betrayal and murder...Then, in suburban Seattle, the real truth about a picture perfect family is revealed when someone vanishes.

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: In Sioux Falls' deaf community, Darlene Vander Giesen finds the perfect romance until a jealous friend severs the bond. Later, pilot Lance Anderson makes flight attendant, Kathi, his wife. When she meets Capt. Gerald Russell, heavy turbulence ensues.

programme.title: Surviving Evil
programme.desc: With her two young kids strapped in the backseat of her minivan, a Miami woman is carjacked in broad daylight from the parking lot of her local church. And to protect her family, she must do every terrible thing her sadistic kidnapper demands.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: 32-year-old Michele Whitaker is leading a troubled life when she disappears without a trace. Her family and local police investigate every possible lead for 6 painful years until one day when a phone call gives them the answers they're looking for.

programme.title: Killer Unknown
programme.desc: A devastated family recounts the horrifying moments leading up to the murder of Veda Woodson on a deserted road. Also, on the Dean case, early investigators look into Dena's family to arrive at a shocking conclusion.

programme.title: Murder Loves Company
programme.desc: This quaint neighbourhood in Jacksonville, Florida seems to be an unlikely place for any crime at all, let alone murder.

programme.title: My Dirty Little Secret
programme.desc: Marlene and Bill Major are young lovers who appear to be living in bliss.But behind closed doors, this wholesome family is anything but.When a house built on lies starts to crumble, the consequences are horrifying, dark secrets start to unearth.

programme.title: Cold Hearted
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, that's how Navy man Cory Voss meets his wife Cat. When money runs dry she seeks the attention of a seemingly wealthier man. But when Cat finds out he isn't who he says the Voss family falls apart.

programme.title: I'd Kill for You
programme.desc: In Reno, NV, casino "pit boss" Jerry Cassadav falls for sexy Sharee Miller. They begin a steamy online affair, but their relationship gets tricky when Sharee tells Jerry that she's married to a mobster who has found out about their affair.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A woman in Dayton, Ohio welcomes a young family when they move into the long derelict house next door. But escalating fights over everything from treatment of pets to treatment of children leads to a violent, bloody, and deadly confrontation.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: When a former police officer is dumped she takes the law into her own hands; a quiet housewife buries her marriage problems in the garden; and an excited fiancée turns into the worst kind of bridezilla.

programme.title: Evil Stepmothers
programme.desc: Growing up with a disfigured face, Patti Donahue feels like the butt of every joke. As an adult, Patti vows to get the last laugh. And when she marries an innocent father of three, she turns their lives into a world of deception, abuse and murder.

programme.title: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: In a small Tennessee town, Jenelle Potter has few friends. When her attraction to one of them isn't mutual, she is ostracized and feels threatened. Then a shadowy figure guides her family into a dark plot with a twisted ending no one saw coming.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Sheriff deputies with a perfect marriage reveal a shocking tale of good cop/ bad cop that can only end in a fugitive on the run.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: Lisa Bradford lives a quiet, country life in Arkansas with her husband Dennis and their two young kids. Their love story takes a devastating turn when they get a visit from police, unveiling a double life of crime so heinous it rips the marriage apart.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: 1986. A 13-year-old girl escapes her captors, then lives in fear they'll return to kill her. A young boy learns his father's fate and realizes his nightmares are memories, and a prison break leads a rookie cop on the hunt for two ruthless murderers.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: Mid 1980's. A District Attorney in Wichita Falls, Texas has multiple gruesome homicides to solve. A father's grief provokes him to meet his daughter's killer face to face, and over 100 miles away, a husband is accused of the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Joshua Hudnall went off to war, he felt more at home in combat than he ever did around his mother. Just when Joshua thought he had escaped her torment, she set her sights on someone else, and destroyed their family from within.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An investigation into the death of a Hollywood therapist and whether the system did enough to protect her from alleged killer Gareth Pursehouse.

programme.title: Vanished in New Canaan: An ID Mystery
programme.desc: When clues at Jennifer Dulos's New Canaan, Connecticut home prompt police to search for the missing mother, her estranged husband's behaviour deepens the mystery. A complex web of evidence secures arrests, but what happens next shocks the nation.

programme.title: A Crime to Remember
programme.desc: On one terrible morning, ten year old Leona O'Loughlin doesn't show up for school while her detective father, Leo, falls violently ill.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A young mom calls 911 claiming she cut her own throat in front of her ex-husband and child. Doctors say there’s no way she did it to herself.

programme.title: Deadly Devotion
programme.desc: When Netta McKoy moves in with her boyfriend Peter Moses Jr., she finds out he is a polygamist cult leader trying to populate a nation of Black Hebrew Israelites.

programme.title: Deadly Devotion
programme.desc: Sergei Kobozev, an up-and-coming Russian boxer, immigrates to Brooklyn, NY in the early 90's with dreams of becoming a world champion. He soon proves he has the talent and determination, so when he goes missing, it's a total shock to the boxing world.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Bill and Mary Yoder are a happy couple, running a medical practice outside of Utica, New York. But their world collapses when Mary becomes mysteriously sick, and detectives prove that her illness was no accident.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Gary and Jan Tyrrell are a beloved couple living in a quaint suburb of Springfield, Missouri. The tight-knit community is soon rocked by their double homicide, with friends and neighbours looking at those closest to the pair as their potential killer.

programme.title: Pandora's Box: Unleashing Evil
programme.desc: A park ranger in Texas pulls over a suspicious truck filled with marijuana. The passenger flees deep into the desert, unleashing a manhunt that will unearth something far more sinister--and bizarre--than detectives could ever have imagined.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A decorated police officer and single father relies on his kind and generous neighbors to help care for his beloved daughter. When she accuses one of them of molesting her, anger boils over, all hell breaks loose... and blood flows in the streets.

programme.title: 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: In 2014, police are called to a lifeless body in a trailer in Winona, Missouri. The owners, Jason and Stephanie McClurg, have suffered a series of misfortunes which have put their marriage under enormous pressure. But nobody expected it to lead to murder.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: A quiet affluent retirement community in Monroe, Ohio is baffled when Barbara Howe simply vanishes one night. The police soon find her body in the trunk of her car, her throat slit. The hunt for her killer takes them back to an unlikely source.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: When firefighters are called to a blazing truck, what they find in the house pales in comparison the bullet-ridden bodies of Robert and Dorothy Pape. And the heat turns up when police realize the extinguished truck belongs to someone else.

programme.title: Valley of the Damned
programme.desc: When Jim Durgan's body is found in Prison Valley, no one knows why. His estranged wife is drawing a blank and his out-of-state girlfriend can't explain it. What follows is a murky investigation that unravels a sinister and cleverly staged murder plot.

programme.title: Devil Among Us
programme.desc: A serial killer stalks Orange County, CA, targeting the homeless. Meanwhile, a young man stands accused of murdering his family. Investigators must race to find the crucial link between the cases.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: A frigid winter hovers over St Paul, Minnesota. 30 year old Kira Steger hasn't reported to work and her family and friends are terrified she might be in danger. Her disappearance leads to a three month investigation that halts to a heartbreaking ending.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: 74-year-old widow Virginia Johannessen is shot dead in her home; then, another widow is murdered on the same street. Is someone targeting widows on Felton Road? As police unravel the truth, they discover they've made a chilling mistake.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: When a teenager goes missing from her local Walmart, detectives struggle for leads. But then surveillance cameras reveal terrifying footage of a prowler kidnapping her, transforming this investigation into a desperate race to bring her home alive.

programme.title: Sean Taylor: Murder of a Football Legend

programme.desc: George fishes for snapper around a wreck off Fort Myers.

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show
programme.desc: The Thousand Islands area of Lake Ontario is a Smallmouth powerhouse. And speaking of power in the sport of bass fishing, this week's guest Brandon Palaniuk is one of the best in the business. Time for he and Z to go to work on them.

programme.title: Catching Bass With Dustin Wilks
programme.desc: Dustin teaches two of the best bass techniques for moving water.

programme.title: Major League Fishing Cups
programme.desc: The final eight anglers compete on Bull Shoals Lake to win the Lucas Oil Challenge Cup Championship presented by B&W Trailer Hitches, from Mountain Home, Arkansas.

programme.title: Major League Fishing: All Angles
programme.desc: Learn how the pros played the game on Day 5 of the 2021 Challenge Cup. Featuring exclusive interviews and behind the scenes content. From Neenah, Wisconsin.

programme.title: Bass Pro Shop's Collegiate Bass Series
programme.desc: Coverage of the first half of Day two of the 2020 BoatUS Collegiate Bass Fishing Championship.

programme.title: Pro Team Journal
programme.desc: Greg and Todd use a new less frustrating grass crankbait.

programme.title: Ultimate Match Fishing
programme.desc: Two UMF rookies, Jacob Powroznik and Keith Combs, go head-to-head for the Pelican’s Ultimate Match Fishing Championship.

programme.title: The Scott Martin Challenge
programme.desc: Fishing at the Camolot Bell.

programme.title: Force on Force
programme.desc: This 10th anniversary special takes special looks at previous season.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: The crew loads up and targets some monster carp on the fly alongside some bass fishing.

programme.title: Shorelines With April Vokey
programme.desc: April Vokey, together with photographer Adrienne Comeau, explore the rivers of Northern British Columbia with a new-age of steelheaders and discuss how it is up to this generation to pass on the traditions of yesterday while focusing on sustainability.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Project Dreamboat
programme.desc: Stuart Boatworks designs a brand-new shallow water skiff, while George LaBonte joins Tony Eden on his customized 31 Contender.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish
programme.desc: Fred searches for a 1000 pound sturgeon.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: The fleet dials into the crab and a typhoon is taking its toll. When a bout sinks, tragic stories abound on the fleet. Yet, as soon as the weather clears, the men are sent back to fishing. The men have to stay focused to escape death.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The country has become a popular holiday destination for tourists from the UK, and it also has plenty to offer when it comes to carp fishing as well, including some of the most prolific big carp waters in Europe.
